About

Martin Klepsch is a young web developer from Berlin, Germany.

Beside backend programming Martin is also interested in many aspects of application development like user interaction design.

Colophon

This site was coded mostly by hand in Vim. It is generated by Jekyll and uses Github Pages for static hosting. Text is set in Arvo, served by Google webfonts.

I used the Skeleton framework to have a basic grid system and a responsive design across different screen resolutions.
